text: Yes, you will be able participate without attending the main conference. Hopefully we can make it free to attend, so people may even be willing to travel a little distance just for the dev day. I don't think we will attempt to include online participants as that requires more organization and it will already be a challenge to get people making useful progress in 1 day. But that's not a hard rule and we may be able to loop people in on an ad-hoc basis, especially those with more experience that can be more independent/add useful expertise. I think we will also focus on contribution to base R/help with CRAN.

elements.text: Yes, you will be able participate without attending the main conference. Hopefully we can make it free to attend, so people may even be willing to travel a little distance just for the dev day. I don't think we will attempt to include online participants as that requires more organization and it will already be a challenge to get people making useful progress in 1 day. But that's not a hard rule and we may be able to loop people in on an ad-hoc basis, especially those with more experience that can be more independent/add useful expertise. I think we will also focus on contribution to base R/help with CRAN.
